tool.name: Send file to owncloud
tool.description: send dataset to your Owncloud account on this server

param.name: inputfile
param.label: Select input file
param.help: Choose file to send to Owncloud

param.name: filename
param.label: Filename (and optionally path) on Owncloud
param.help: Choose a name for the file. You can also specify a directory within your owncloud account: some/path/to/filename.txt (directories must exist) CAUTION: tool will override existing files, so choose filename with care!

param.name: mypass
param.label: Owncloud password
param.help: WARNING: password will appear in the clear in this text field.

tool.help:
This tool will export the selected dataset to your Owncloud directory. Users must provide a name for the file, and their Owncloud password.
View your Owncloud directory here_.
.. _here: /owncloud
Files will appear in your top-level Owncloud directory unless a path is specified.
**NOTE** For security reasons there will be no output dataset for this tool, but if all was correct, the file should appear in your Owncloud account. If it does not, please make sure that you used the correct password, and that all directories on the filepath you provided exist.
**CAUTION** This tool WILL overwrite existing files, so choose your filename carefully!
